data.message: When implementing compounding feedback loops: 1) Use explicit `is not None` checks for deltas to avoid footguns if partial=0.0 later. 2) Separate `verified_at` (status became validated) from `last_evaluated_at` (any confidence change) for cleaner audit trails. 3) Set delta sign explicitly (-0.01) rather than using negation logic to avoid comment/code mismatch bugs.
